trans-unit.source: Provides functions to update each workflow's designer command (that is, input gestures collection).
trans-unit.target: Fornece funções para atualizar cada comando do designer de fluxo de trabalho (ou seja, a coleção de gestos de entrada).

trans-unit.source: You should provide an <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.IWorkflowCommandExtensionCallback" /> implementation to receive notifications.
trans-unit.target: Você deve fornecer uma implementação de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.IWorkflowCommandExtensionCallback" /> para receber notificações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.WorkflowCommandExtensionItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.WorkflowCommandExtensionItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.WorkflowCommandExtensionItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.WorkflowCommandExtensionItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.WorkflowCommandExtensionItem" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.IWorkflowCommandExtensionCallback" /> implementation to receive notifications.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.WorkflowCommandExtensionItem" /> com a implementação <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.IWorkflowCommandExtensionCallback" /> especificada para receber notificações.

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of this extension item.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o tipo deste item de extensão.
